title: Child grazed by bullet in Columbus shooting on Fourth Street
content:
An 8-year-old girl was grazed by a bullet Wednesday night in a shooting near the Circle K at 215 4th St., according to Columbus police.
Officials said the child was transported to Midtown Medical Center for treatment following the 10:20 p.m. incident. She has since been released, confirmed Jessica Word, Columbus Regional spokeswoman.
An officer was conducting a traffic stop at the intersection of Fourth Street and Third Avenue when the assault occurred. There are no suspects in custody.
